Interface GridClientConfiguration

public interface GridClientConfiguration

Java client configuration.

DFLT_CLIENT_PROTOCOL

static final GridClientProtocol DFLT_CLIENT_PROTOCOL
Default client protocol.

DFLT_TOP_REFRESH_FREQ

static final int DFLT_TOP_REFRESH_FREQ
Default topology refresh frequency is 2 sec.

See Also:

static final long DFLT_MAX_CONN_IDLE_TIME
Default maximum time connection can be idle.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DFLT_TCP_NODELAY

static final boolean DFLT_TCP_NODELAY
Default flag setting for TCP_NODELAY option.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getServers

Collection<String> getServers()
Collection of 'host:port' pairs representing remote grid servers used to establish initial connection to the grid. Once connection is established, GridGain will get a full view on grid topology and will be able to connect to any available remote node.

Returns:
Collection of 'host:port' pairs representing remote grid servers.

getProtocol

GridClientProtocol getProtocol()
Gets protocol for communication between client and remote grid.

Returns:
Protocol for communication between client and remote grid.

getConnectTimeout

int getConnectTimeout()
Gets timeout for socket connect operation.

Returns:
Socket connect timeout in milliseconds.

isTcpNoDelay

boolean isTcpNoDelay()
Gets flag indicating whether TCP_NODELAY flag should be enabled for outgoing connections. This flag reduces communication latency and in the majority of cases should be set to true. For more information, see Socket.setTcpNoDelay(boolean)

If not set, default value is GridClientConfiguration.DFLT_TCP_NODELAY

Returns:
If TCP_NODELAY should be set on underlying sockets.

isSslEnabled

boolean isSslEnabled()
Flag indicating whether client should try to connect server with secure socket layer enabled (regardless of protocol used).

Returns:
True if SSL should be enabled.

getSslContextFactory

org.gridgain.client.ssl.GridSslContextFactory getSslContextFactory()
Gets a factory that should be used for SSL context creation if SSL is enabled.

Returns:
Factory instance.
See Also:
GridSslContextFactory, GridClientConfiguration.isSslEnabled()

getBalancer

GridClientLoadBalancer getBalancer()
Default balancer to be used for computational client. It can be overridden for different compute instances.

Returns:
Default balancer to be used for computational client.

getDataConfigurations

Collection<GridClientDataConfiguration> getDataConfigurations()
Gets a collection of data configurations specified by user.

Returns:
Collection of data configurations (possibly empty).

getCredentials

Object getCredentials()
Gets client credentials to authenticate with.

Returns:
Credentials object (possibly null)

isEnableTopologyCache

boolean isEnableTopologyCache()
Enables client to cache topology internally, so it does not have to be always refreshed. Topology cache will be automatically refreshed in the background every GridClientConfiguration.getTopologyRefreshFrequency() interval.

Returns:
True if topology cache is enabled, false otherwise.

getTopologyRefreshFrequency

long getTopologyRefreshFrequency()
Gets topology refresh frequency.

Returns:
Topology refresh frequency.

getMaxConnectionIdleTime

long getMaxConnectionIdleTime()
Gets maximum amount of time that client connection can be idle before it is closed.

Returns:
Maximum idle time in milliseconds.
